description: This Java source file defines the MockZoneCluster class, which simulates a Zigbee zone device (such as a door/window sensor) within a testing environment. It includes attributes, status management, and event handling to mimic real device behaviors for testing purposes.

classes.name: MockZoneCluster.ZoneType
classes.description: Enumeration representing different types of zones (e.g., motion, contact, fire sensor).

classes.name: MockZoneCluster.ZoneStatus
classes.description: Helper class for representing the status flags of the zone, with methods to set various status bits, and convert to byte array.

methods.name: MockZoneCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the Mock Zone Cluster with given EUI, endpoint, zone type, and optional open/closed state.

methods.name: setFaulted
methods.description: Sets the open/closed fault state and triggers status change event.

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Sets tamper state and triggers status change event.

methods.name: isFaulted
methods.description: Returns whether the zone is in a faulted (open) state.

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Returns whether the zone has been tampered with.

methods.name: isTroubled
methods.description: Returns whether the zone is in trouble.

methods.name: setTroubled
methods.description: Sets trouble state and triggers status change event.

methods.name: isEnrolled
methods.description: Returns whether the zone device is enrolled.

methods.name: getCieAddress
methods.description: Returns the CIE address associated with the zone.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves the attribute's data bytes based on attribute ID.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Sets attribute data bytes, particularly for the CIE address.

methods.name: handleCommand
methods.description: Handles incoming commands, such as enrollment response.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the low battery status and updates status event.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Returns whether the device has low battery.
